name: Autoscopy
description:
"Well well, look who's awake!" Mankind is divided. Robots and humans are at war, and the world is now running on fumes. You wake up to a concerned voice over an earpiece, and to find the world you once knew overrun by nature’s reclamation of a long-gone cybernetic city. The voice is trying to guide you to one of the last surviving human civilizations, to reunite with your allies. Along the journey you explore the world and its story, as it unfolds within captured events – frozen in time. 

In the post-cyberpunk world of Autoscopy you will run from rooftop to streets while uncovering the mysterious circumstances you find yourself in.

Follow POi Studios on social media!
